apy_ada_tooltip:
The Net supplier APY (interest + ADA staking rewards) is {{apy}}.
The interest earned on supplied ADA in Liqwid is {{supplyApy}}%.
ADA market utilization is {{utilization}}%.
The ADA staking reward is {{adaStakingApy}}% (calculated based on the average of the last 1 epochs).
The formula used to calculate this is: Net ADA Supplier APY = (Total deposited ADA x Supplier APY) + (Total deposited ADA (1-Utilization Rate) x Staking APY)
lq_apy_display:
Link to APR calculations
This APR indicates the estimated return from LQ market participation rewards. It is a calculation based on the updated dynamic emissions formulae (3-day epoch). The displayed APRs are purely informational and based on estimates that change over time. The displayed APRs are not financial, investment, tax, legal, or technical advice. Any use of decentralized finance protocols involves various financial risks. Nothing displayed in this app is financial advice and it is your responsibility to complete due diligence (do your own research).

supply_list.title: Your Supplies
supply_list.empty_search: No supplies match the search criteria
supply_list.connect_wallet: Connect your wallet to see your supplies

tooltip.balance: Balance is the total amount of tokens you have deposited in the protocol
tooltip.wallet_balance: Wallet balance is the total amount of tokens you have in your wallet
tooltip.apy: APY (Annual Percentage Yield) for each asset
tooltip.locked_collateral: Locked as collateral refers to the amount of assets used as security when borrowing

borrow_list.empty_search: No borrows match the search criteria
borrow_list.connect_wallet: Connect your wallet to see your borrows
borrow_list.loan_interest: The interest on your loan is {{interest}} {{id}}

tooltip.debt: Total amount borrowed by the user and the amount required to repay the loan.
tooltip.total_collateral: Total amount of collateral locked in the current loan
tooltip.apy: Annual interest rate paid by the borrower for the loan
tooltip.health_factor: When the health factor reaches 1.00, your position can be liquidated
tooltip.LTV: LTV is the ratio of the loan amount to the value of the collateral
tooltip.health_factor_low: Your health factor is currently low, if it reaches 1.0, you could be liquidated

action.no_collateral_available: No collateral available, please supply some first

info.max_borrow_cap_reached: Your max borrow amount of {{maxBorrow}} {{id}} exceeds the limit allowed due to the current liquidity. The max borrow amount right now is at {{maxBorrowCap}} {{id}}.
info.max_supply_cap_reached: Your max supply amount of {{maxSupply}} {{id}} exceeds the limit allowed due to the current supply cap. The maximum you can supply in a single transaction is {{supplyCap}} {{id}}. Multiple transactions may be required for the full amount.
info.max_withdraw_cap_reached: Your max withdraw amount of {{maxWithdraw}} {{id}} exceeds the limit allowed due to the current borrow cap. The maximum you can withdraw in a single transaction is {{withdrawCap}} {{id}}. Multiple transactions may be required for the full amount.
info.wash_borrow: This is a wash borrow loan, you only have the option to either partially or fully repay the loan.

error.min_ada: You need to have at least {{minAda}} ADA to perform an action on the platform.
error.min_health_factor: The minimum health factor is {{minHealthFactor}}. Increase your collateral or decrease your borrow.
error.min_health_factor_safe_mode: The minimum health factor is {{minHealthFactor}}. Increase your collateral or decrease your borrow or disable the safe mode in the settings. Please note that by disabling safe mode you open yourself up to higher risk of liquidation.
error.max_collaterals_reached: The maximum collateral you can add is {{maxCollaterals}}.

guide.step_1:
Start by selecting an asset to borrow.
Scroll through all the assets and click on the one you'd like to borrow for this transaction.
guide.step_2:
Select the assets you want to use as collateral and specify the amount for each.
Adjust this amount using the slider by clicking the icon next to the asset logo, or press 'Max' to use the entire supplied balance.
guide.step_3: Enter the amount you wish to borrow.
guide.step_4: Carefully review your transaction details. Ensure that all information is accurate before proceeding.
guide.step_5: Here's a summary of the asset you are borrowing from the platform.

error.max_amount: You cannot borrow more than your limit of {{maxAmount}} {{id}}

modify_action.title: Modify your {{id}} loan
modify_action.modify_loan_info: Reduce the amount to repay or Increase to borrow more

guide.step_1:
Start by selecting the loan you wish to modify.
Scroll through the list of loans and click on the one you want to adjust for this transaction.
guide.step_2:
Choose the assets you want to add or remove as collateral and enter the desired amounts.
Adjust this amount using the slider by clicking the icon next to the asset logo, or press 'Max' to use the entire supplied balance.
guide.step_3: Specify the new amount you wish to borrow or repay in the input field. To decrease your debt, enter a lower amount, to increase the loan, enter a higher amount.
guide.step_4: Carefully review your transaction details. Ensure that all information is accurate before proceeding.
guide.step_5: Here's a summary of the asset you are modifying from the platform.

error.min_value: Minimum debt to modify your loan is {{minValue}} {{id}}
error.min_value_borrow: Minimum amount to borrow more is {{minValue}} {{id}}
error.max_amount: You cannot borrow more than your limit of {{maxAmount}} {{id}}
error.insufficient_balance: You have an insufficient balance in your wallet to repay the debt of {{amount}} {{id}} on your loan. The available amount in your wallet is {{walletAmount}} {{id}}.

guide.step_1:
Start by selecting an asset to supply from those available in your wallet.
Scroll through your assets and click on the desired one for this transaction.
guide.step_2:
Enter the amount you wish to supply.
Adjust this amount using the slider by clicking the icon next to the asset logo, or press 'Max' to use the entire balance.
guide.step_3: Carefully review your transaction details. Ensure that all information is accurate before proceeding.
guide.step_4: Here's a summary of the asset on the platform.

error.max_amount: You cannot supply more than your limit of {{maxAmount}} {{id}}
You cannot withdraw more than your limit of {{maxAmount}} {{id}}
error.bad_rest: You cannot be left with a supply under {{minValue}} {{id}}, please withdraw all instead or enter a lower amount.

tooltip.market_utxo: The number of unique accounts/pools in a market that users can interact with at a given moment in time. Liquidity in a market is spread across these accounts more or less evenly.
